about: AzConf will be a 3 day multi-track virtual online only conference between 01-03 December 2020. The conference is aimed at Cloud and Web Developers working with open source and cloud native technologies on the Microsoft Stack. We host technology experts from India and abroad to educate, network, and share their expertise with our global attendees on
topics: Developer Technologies (anything that runs on Azure)
DevOps and Cloud Native Technologies on Azure
header_subtitle: A virtual Microsoft Azure Conference for Developers, Organized by Bangalore Azure User Group Community
